alert.note: Alert for Baker; Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 7:16PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Baker, central Columbia, east central Suwannee and southeastern Hamilton Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 716 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Watertown, or over Lake City, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake City, White Springs, Five Points, Watertown, Winfield, Suwannee Valley and Olustee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee
